name: Slug (Bri)
description:
Game made for the GE #3 Jam.

The theme of this jam was "duality". I tried to fit the theme with the 1-bit color palette, as well as with the slugs themselves. They serve as an obstacle to the player, but also as a tool to progress. I unfortunately didn't find the time to make enough levels to show this off, but I am interested in developing this game more in the future.

I didn't put the name of the song used in the game because I'm stupid, so here is the music credited to the original artist correctly:

Music: Eric Skiff - All of Us - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
